Title: Relates to owner liability for failure of a driver to stop for a school bus displaying a red visual signal and stop-arm
Summary: Relates to the fine schedule for owner liability for failure of a vehicle operator to stop for a school bus displaying a red visual signal and stop-arm.
LawCode: Amd ยง1174-a, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to the amount of owner liability for failure of a vehicle operator to stop for a school bus displaying a red visual signal and stop-arm
